casebody.data:
Luis ROJAS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 26, 2017

Michael W. Brown, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Melissa L. Streeto, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Luis Rojas' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 171 Conn.App. 694, 157 A.3d 709 (2017), is denied.
